inclusion.criterion: recurrent UTIs defined as ≥ 3 episodes of antibiotic treated acute cystitis (acute symptoms specific/related to the urinary tract) during the last twelve months or ≥ 2 episodes during the last 6 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: able and willing to comply with all trial requirements
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the patient has taken methenamine hippurate within the last 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: the patient is allergic to methenamine hippurate
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the patient has a urinary catheter (chronic indwelling catheters as well as intermittent urinary catheterisation)
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis. Has an indwelling suprapubic catheter with significant leaking around the site.
